analysis.description:
Reentrancy in SBITokenCrowdsale.processPayment (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#373-440):
	External calls:
	- remainingTokenBalance = token.balanceOf(saleWalletAddress) / tokenMultiplier (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#382-383)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- goalReached (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#417-418)

SBITokenCrowdsale.processPayment (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#373-440) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(saleWalletAddress,investorAddress,tokenAmount * tokenMultiplier) (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#421-422)

SBITokenCrowdsale.kill (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#460-464) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(saleWalletAddress,featureDevelopment.addr,featureDevelopmentAmount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol)

Reentrancy in SBITokenCrowdsale.SBITokenCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#334-350):
	External calls:
	- tokenMultiplier = tokenMultiplier ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#342-343)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- saleGoal (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#348-350)
	- saleWalletAddress (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#343-344)

Reentrancy in SBITokenCrowdsale.processPayment (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#373-440):
	External calls:
	- remainingTokenBalance = token.balanceOf(saleWalletAddress) / tokenMultiplier (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#382-383)
	- token.transferFrom(saleWalletAddress,investorAddress,tokenAmount * tokenMultiplier) (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#421-422)
	External calls sending eth:
	- investorAddress.transfer(change) (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#430-431)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investmentRecords (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#437-438)
	- totalCollected (/unique_chucks/24/0xe01ba6c593003b0edcd43b7839a7c36b00a44dfc.sol#438-439)
